What's this, you brought it?\""},{"lineNumber":1747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルさん、なんか忙しそうだったんで。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seel seemed kind of busy."},{"lineNumber":1748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　掃除よりは楽だったし」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was easier than cleaning, too.\""},{"lineNumber":1749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴め、主の世話より優先するとは……ずず。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That one prioritizes something over taking care of the master... slurp."},{"lineNumber":1750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ん、まぁまぁだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, well, it's alright.\""},{"lineNumber":1751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃどうも。それじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you very much. Well then...\""},{"lineNumber":1752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泥棒だーーーーーーー！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thiefーーーーーー!!"},{"lineNumber":1753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パン泥棒が出たぞーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's a bread thiefーーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":1754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「犯人確保ーーーーー！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suspect caughtーーーー!!\""},{"lineNumber":1755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃーーーーーーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaaaaaaaaaaa!?"},{"lineNumber":1756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく懲りんなお前も！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You really don't learn your lesson!"},{"lineNumber":1757,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあさあお仕置きだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, it's punishment time—"},{"lineNumber":1758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まっ、待った待った！　知らないですって！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, wait! I don't know anything!"},{"lineNumber":1759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっ、こら、胸揉むな……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, don't grope my chest...!\""},{"lineNumber":1760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「信じられるか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can you believe it?"},{"lineNumber":1761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ身体検査だーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, a body searchーーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":1762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃ、ぎゃーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gya, gyaaaaaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":1763,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………","translatedEnglishLine":".............."},{"lineNumber":1764,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":1765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……無いな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... nothing here."},{"lineNumber":1766,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アソコの中にでも隠してるかと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought maybe it was hidden down there...\""},{"lineNumber":1767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから無いですって！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I told you, there's nothing!\""},{"lineNumber":1768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ったく……濡れ衣ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief... I'm being falsely accused.\""},{"lineNumber":1769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、自分のそのそこそこグッドな手触りの胸に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You, placing your hands on your own reasonably good-feeling chest,"},{"lineNumber":1770,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手を当てて、同じ事が言えるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"can you say the same thing then?\""},{"lineNumber":1771,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仕方ないんですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have no choice."},{"lineNumber":1772,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パンしか食べられない病気の両親が4人と","translatedEnglishLine":"I have four parents suffering from a disease that only lets them eat silent."},{"lineNumber":1785,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイジは足音を殺して厨房へと向かっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Heidi was sneaking silently towards the soon...)"},{"lineNumber":1788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn...\""},{"lineNumber":1789,"originalJapaneseLine":"ごそごそと、音がした。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was a rustling sound."},{"lineNumber":1790,"originalJapaneseLine":"厨房の片隅で、何かが蠢いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Something was stirring in the corner of the kitchen."},{"lineNumber":1791,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うわっ……ホントにいた！","translatedEnglishLine":"(Whoa... it’s really there!"},{"lineNumber":1792,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、でも食い詰めたおっさんとかだったら","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, but if it’s some desperate old man,"},{"lineNumber":1793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やばいかも……）","translatedEnglishLine":"that might be bad...)"},{"lineNumber":1794,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あっ、でも、あっちの棚！","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ah, but that shelf over there!"},{"lineNumber":1795,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私厳選、A5ランクのパンに手を……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"They're reaching for my carefully selected A5 grade bread...!)"},{"lineNumber":1796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……うん、これ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... yeah, this...\""},{"lineNumber":1797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待たんかーーーい！　そこまでよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waitーーー! That's far enough!"},{"lineNumber":1798,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このパン泥棒！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You bread thief!\""},{"lineNumber":1799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あッ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":1800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………って…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...wait...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うげっ、ばれてる……」
結局今月のハイジの給金は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, this month's salary for Heidi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のメイドと大差なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was no different from the other maids'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい失礼しまーす、ご主人様。
お茶ですよー」
「ん？　なんだ、お前が持ってきたのか」
「シィルさん、なんか忙しそうだったんで。
掃除よりは楽だったし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was easier than cleaning, too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴め、主の世話より優先するとは……ずず。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That one prioritizes something over taking care of the master... slurp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、まぁまぁだ」
「そりゃどうも。それじゃ……」
「泥棒だーーーーーーー！！
パン泥棒が出たぞーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a bread thiefーーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「犯人確保ーーーーー！！」
「ぎゃーーーーーーーー！？」
「まったく懲りんなお前も！
さあさあお仕置きだー」
「まっ、待った待った！　知らないですって！
あっ、こら、胸揉むな……！」
「信じられるか！
さあ身体検査だーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, a body searchーーーー!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃ、ぎゃーーーーーー！」
「むう……無いな。
アソコの中にでも隠してるかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought maybe it was hidden down there..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから無いですって！」
「ったく……濡れ衣ですよ」
「お前、自分のそのそこそこグッドな手触りの胸に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, placing your hands on your own reasonably good-feeling chest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を当てて、同じ事が言えるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can you say the same thing then?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仕方ないんですよ。
パンしか食べられない病気の両親が4人と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have four parents suffering from a disease that only lets them eat bread,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わんわんとにゃんにゃんとその従兄弟がいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a woof-woof, a meow-meow, and their cousins..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつも違う数字をほざいとるだろーが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You always spout out different numbers, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし……今回は本当に泥棒か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... is it really a thief this time?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……人の出入り、多いですからねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well... since many people come and go...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、こそ泥くらいならサーナキア……か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if it's just a petty thief, Sarnakia... or

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが捕まえるだろ」
「私のナワバリでパンを盗もうとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To try to steal bread in my territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふてぇ野郎だ……ってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you’re a brazen bastard... or something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時折、巡回の騎士が回っている以外は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Other than the occasional patrolling knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 静まりかえった通路の中。
ハイジは足音を殺して厨房へと向かっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heidi was sneaking silently towards the kitchen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （泥棒は盗もうとして見つかって逃げた……らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The thief tried to steal bread, got caught, and apparently ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てことは、たぶんまた近いうちに……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That means, probably again sometime soon...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごそごそと、音がした。
厨房の片隅で、何かが蠢いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something was stirring in the corner of the kitchen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うわっ……ホントにいた！
あ、でも食い詰めたおっさんとかだったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but if it’s some desperate old man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばいかも……）
（あっ、でも、あっちの棚！
私厳選、A5ランクのパンに手を……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're reaching for my carefully selected A5 grade bread...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……うん、これ……」
「待たんかーーーい！　そこまでよ！
このパン泥棒！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something was stirring in the corner of the kitchen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うわっ……ホントにいた！
あ、でも食い詰めたおっさんとかだったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but if it’s some desperate old man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばいかも……）
（あっ、でも、あっちの棚！
私厳選、A5ランクのパンに手を……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're reaching for my carefully selected A5 grade bread...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……うん、これ……」
「待たんかーーーい！　そこまでよ！
このパン泥棒！」
